WorkflowInfo.Name: Migrate database table to excel
WorkflowInfo.Description: Read database table and insert it into excel file
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:TSQLQuery;Assembly=TSQLQuery, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:WriteXLS;Assembly=WriteXLS, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:TSQLQuery Password="EyeShare^1" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=127.0.0.1;Initial Catalog=eyeShare;User Id=sa;Password=EyeShare^1;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from accounts" SiteName="Default Site" Description="Run SQL query on microsoft database" EyeShareConnectionString="True" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="sa" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=127.0.0.1;Initial Catalog=eyeShare" /><ns1:WriteXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="writeXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%tsqlQuery1%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write Excel" Path="c:\eyeShare_Accounts.XLS" Password="" Description="Write a result set as an Excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteXLS" UserName="" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
